network_connect_fail: Failed to connect to the network.
connection_reset_request: Your Learner's Block will now attempt to connect. It will be availabe to you by connecting your device to the same WiFi network. If after a minute your device is still not connected to your chosen WiFi network, reconnect to your Learner's Block, check your password and try again.
no_networks: No wifi networks available. Please ensure there is a network within range and reboot the device.
